entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 10:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -30.4°C
Pressure: 103.6 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.0°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
